ctl:suite.name: sos:suite
ctl:suite.ctl:title: SOS 1.0 Compliance Test Suite
ctl:suite.ctl:description: Verifies that an SOS 1.0 implementation complies with a given conformance class.

ctl:test.name: sos:Main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The IUT satisfies all applicable assertions.

body.h2: Compliance test suite for Sensor Observation Service (SOS) 1.0
body.p: Please provide a URL from which a capabilities document can be retrieved.
Modify the URL template below to specify the location of an OGC SOS implementation under test.
Please select whether to run all tests or just selected tests.
If you want to run selected tests, please select the checkboxes for the tests you want to run.
Please press the "Start" button to start testing.

xsl:variable.name: run-sos-core
xsl:variable.select: $run-sos-gc-kvp-rph or $run-sos-gc-kvp-rsph or $run-sos-gc-kvp-rrph or $run-sos-gc-ommo or $run-sos-gc-omoo or $run-sos-gc-rcvt or $run-sos-gc-rcvp or $run-sos-gc-rcvop or $run-sos-gc-rcvrf or $run-sos-gc-rcvrm or $run-sos-gc-rcvrm2 or $run-sos-ds-rimt or $run-sos-ds-rip or $run-sos-ds-rmrf or $run-sos-ds-rmp or $run-sos-go-risn or $run-sos-go-riet or $run-sos-go-rip or $run-sos-go-rifoi or $run-sos-go-riop or $run-sos-go-rir or $run-sos-go-rirf or $run-sos-go-rirm or $run-sos-go-rirm2 or $run-sos-go-rmsd or $run-sos-go-rmpd or $run-sos-go-rmopd or $run-sos-go-raetd or $run-sos-go-rmetd or $run-sos-go-rmfoid or $run-sos-go-rmrd or $run-sos-go-rmrfd

ctl:test.name: sos:ows-main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "ows" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the ows module.

ctl:test.name: sos:general-main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "general" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the general module.

ctl:test.name: sos:general-SOS.General-InvalidRequest.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Sending a request that is non-conformant to a schema associated with an SOS operation causes the server to return a valid error report message with an exceptionCode value of MissingParameterValue.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Send several test documents that are invalid according to the schemas associated with some of the SOS operations (i.e. the mandatory operations). Pass if the service returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode value of InvalidParamterValue; fail otherwise.

ctl:link.title: Verify that an invalid request produces an appropriate response from the server.

ctl:message.select: 'The body of the request will be "test"'

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response to an invalid request or the response from the server was not a valid exception report. The response from the server was: ""

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Checking the validity of the response to an invalid request.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: The response to an invalid request was expected to be an exception report with an exceptionCode of "MissingParameterValue" and a locator value containing the validation issue. The returned exception report was: ""

ctl:test.name: sos:general-SOS.General-ValidResponse.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: A response is a valid response for the SOS. This general assertion should be tested by all other tests.

ctl:link.title: Verify that a response entity is schema-valid

ctl:code.ctl:message: This general assertion is tested by all other tests, so there is nothing specific to test now.

ctl:test.name: sos:core-main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "core" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the core module.

xsl:variable.name: run-gc-tests
xsl:variable.select: $run-sos-gc-kvp-rph eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-kvp-rsph eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-kvp-rrph eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-ommo eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-omoo eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvt eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvp eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvop eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvrf eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvrm eq 'true' or $run-sos-gc-rcvrm2 eq 'true'

xsl:variable.name: run-ds-tests
xsl:variable.select: $run-sos-ds-rimt eq 'true' or $run-sos-ds-rip eq 'true' or $run-sos-ds-rmrf eq 'true' or $run-sos-ds-rmp eq 'true'

xsl:variable.name: run-go-tests
xsl:variable.select: $run-sos-go-risn eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-riet eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rip eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rifoi eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-riop eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rir eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rirf eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rirm eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rirm2 eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmsd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmpd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmopd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-raetd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmetd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmfoid eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmrd eq 'true' or $run-sos-go-rmrfd eq 'true'

ctl:message.select: 'A request for a valid capabilities document will now be made.'
'If this response passes schema validation, further tests will be performed on the GetCapabilities response.'
'If it fails schema validation, testing will stop.'

xsl:when.ctl:message: GetCapabilites response document failed schema validation.

ctl:message.select: concat('All DescribeSensor tests will use the "Post" method at the following url: ', $describeSensorPostURL)
'This url was obtained from the GetCapabilities response'
'This service does not implement the "POST" for the DescribeSensor operation.'
concat('The outputFormat advertised for the DescribeSensor operation is invalid: ', $describeSensorOutputFormat)
'The encoding, subtype and version must all be specified.'
'No further describe sensor tests will be run until this is rectified'
concat('All GetObservation tests will use the "Post" method at the following url: ', $getObservationPostURL)
'This url was obtained from the GetCapabilities response'
'This service does not implement the "POST" for the GetObservation operation.'
'One or more text/xml responseFormats for one or more offerings is invalid.'
'The encoding, subtype and version must all be specified.'
'No GetObservation tests will be run until this is rectified'
'There are no offerings with valid begin and end times.'
'At least one offering must have observations.'
'The SOS must have observations in order to be tested.'
